title: The Washington Post Exposes Nonstop Lies About the War in Afghanistan | Lupita Nyong'o
itunes:title: The Washington Post Exposes Nonstop Lies About the War in Afghanistan | Lupita Nyong'o
description:
The Washington Post reveals official lies about the Afghan War, and Lupita Nyong'o discusses her role in "Star Wars: The Rise of Skywalker" and her children's book "Sulwe."

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
